general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations according to the weather forecast. Make provision to take care of crops and animals from cold weather conditions. Complete sowing of Rabi crops and start nursery sowing of Summer Paddy where irrigation facilities are available.
